title: april 4: forever lasting love [hosted by: Ricky Montgomery]
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Ricky talks about a record-setting auction of the artwork of Zhang Xiaogang. Afterwards, he talks about a historic Vampire Weekend release. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
